handist.collections.dist

Class SinglePlaceGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.dist.TeamedPlaceGroup
      • handist.collections.dist.SinglePlaceGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    apgas.util.SerializableWithReplace, Serializable

    public class SinglePlaceGroup
extends TeamedPlaceGroup
    SinglePlaceGroup is a place group consisting of a single place. It simply skips collective communications.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • rank

        public int rank(apgas.Place place)
        Description copied from class: TeamedPlaceGroup
        Returns the MPI rank of the specified place in the current TeamedPlaceGroup. If the specified place is not a member of this TeamedPlaceGroup, throws a RuntimeException.
        Overrides:
